author: cnbc.com
title: TS2 Holdings Acquisition Creates California Recruiting Powerhouse
text:
LOS ANGELES, Feb. 2, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- TS2 Holdings LLC has acquired three companies in the executive recruiting space to form a consolidated state-wide operation that combines three high-quality recruiting operations, a software development company and an industry-leading recruiter platform.
The recruiting capabilities of TS2 are expanding dramatically with Neohire South and Hero.jobs building a strong offering in southern California and RockIT Recruiting bringing its solid reputation in the Bay area. Hero.jobs also adds a software operation to the now-statewide recruitment business.
"The acquisition of these three companies will provide the foundational elements of our core business strategy," said Yoshimi Iyadomi, CEO of TS2 Holdings Inc. "When you combine the expertise and energy of the employees, industry knowledge and creativity of the management team, with the broader reach and resources of the combined group, there's a tremendous opportunity for geometric growth. The integrated businesses give TS2 Holdings LLC the opportunity to build a differentiated recruiting model supported by a cutting-edge and tailored software platform that can be leveraged across all major tech markets in the U.S."
"We've invested considerable energy in developing and maintaining the Neohire South brand by building strong relationships with our clients and candidates," said Josh Stomel, founder of Neohire South. "Our mission has always been to provide unparalleled service, industry expertise, trust and quality. As we continue to grow and extend our reach, it was important that we find a partner who shares our ambition, values and vision for the future; we're confident that we've made the right choice."
"At RockIT Recruiting we have hired over 500 engineers for more than 200 Bay Area startups since we got started in 2011," said co-founder Cody Voellinger. "We've become experts at building teams that become great companies. RockIT is looking forward to uniting with the TS2 group companies to add some rocket fuel to our growing business. We are thrilled to find partners that want to expand our best practices to support more companies and job-seekers."
"We're extremely proud of the ATS, candidate and client management platform we've developed," said Tom Frost, co-founder of Hero.jobs. "We're fired up to expand our talented engineering and product management team and combine our recruiting business with the high-energy folks at Neohire South, RockIT and TS2."
Neohire South is a premier recruiting company with offices in Santa Monica and Tarzana, California, specializing in tech and non-tech recruiting for top VCs and technology startups across the U.S.
RockIT Recruiting is an industry-leading tech recruiting company headquartered in San Francisco, California.
Hero.jobs is a Santa Monica, California-based recruiter and recruiting software company, creating the systems to power tomorrow's elite recruiting businesses.
TS2 Holdings LLC is the parent company of several high-quality recruiting companies with primary offices in El Segundo, California.
Ron Scott
